main.java.com.hexcore.vrmeeting_hostserver

Class ServerComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.com.hexcore.vrmeeting_hostserver.ServerComponent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HostServer, IncomingConnectionAccepter, IncomingMessageBroadcaster, Meeting, ThreadedBufferedMessageWriter, ValidationThread

    public abstract class ServerComponent
extends java.lang.Object
    A class extending ServerComponent is a class that can be started and stopped. It also has a state. Unlike threads a class extending this class isn't necessarily threaded. The class is just to enable clean startup and shutdown of the server. A server componenet must be started after initilisation to act but can be stopped by another ServerComponenet. ServerComponents can form a hierarchal structure as a ServerComponent can be a sub component of another. And if the parent component is instructed to stop then so are all sub-components. Classes extending this are expected to handle moving to the stopped state
    Author:
    Psymj1 (Marcus)

        Requests that the server component stops
        Throws:

      • getState

        public ServerComponentState getState()
